text: Colobothea peruviana is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1920 and is known from Peru.BioLib.cz - Colobothea peruviana. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Colobotheini Category:Beetles described in 1920
title: Colobothea peruviana
